verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David. ( God’s Faithful Messiah) ( 10 14:17-24) ;  650 5:1-10 מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר 4210 N-ms ( miz·mō·wr) A Psalm נְאֻ֤ם 5002 N-msc ( nə·’um) said יְהוָ֨ה׀ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) The LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֗י 113 Prep-l│N-msc│1cs ( la·ḏō·nî) to my Lord: שֵׁ֥ב 3427 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( šêḇ) “ Sit לִֽימִינִ֑י 3225 Prep-l│N-fsc│1cs ( lî·mî·nî) at My right hand עַד־ 5704 Prep ( ‘aḏ-) until אָשִׁ֥ית 7896 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’ā·šîṯ) I make אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ 341 V-Qal-Prtcpl-mpc│2ms ( ’ō·yə·ḇe·ḵā) Your enemies הֲדֹ֣ם 1916 N-msc ( hă·ḏōm) a footstool לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ 7272 Prep-l│N-fdc│2ms ( lə·raḡ·le·ḵā) for Your feet. ”

מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> maṭ·ṭêh- scepter עֻזְּךָ֗ <WH5797> ‘uz·zə·ḵā Your mighty יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> yiš·laḥ extends יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> miṣ·ṣî·yō·wn from Zion: רְ֝דֵ֗ה <WH7287> rə·ḏêh “ Rule בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> bə·qe·reḇ in the midst אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> ’ō·yə·ḇe·ḵā of Your enemies. ”

עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> ‘am·mə·ḵā Your people נְדָבֹת֮ <WH5071> nə·ḏā·ḇōṯ [shall be] willing בְּי֪וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm on Your day חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ <WH2428> ḥê·le·ḵā of battle. בְּֽהַדְרֵי־ <WH1926> bə·haḏ·rê- splendor, קֹ֭דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš Arrayed in holy מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> mê·re·ḥem from the womb מִשְׁחָ֑ר <WH4891> miš·ḥār of the dawn, לְ֝ךָ֗ Prep│2ms ( lə·ḵā) to You belongs טַ֣ל 2919 N-msc ( ṭal) the dew יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ 3208 N-fsc│2ms ( yal·ḏu·ṯe·ḵā) of Your youth.

נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> niš·ba‘ has sworn יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> wə·lō and will not יִנָּחֵ֗ם <WH5162> yin·nā·ḥêm change His mind: אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> ’at·tāh- “ You כֹהֵ֥ן <WH3548> ḵō·hên are a priest לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> lə·‘ō·w·lām forever עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- in דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י <WH1700> diḇ·rā·ṯî the order מַלְכִּי־ <WH4442> mal·kî- vvv צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH4442> ṣe·ḏeq of Melchizedek. ” ( Cited in , , and )

אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> ’ă·ḏō·nāy The Lord עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- is at יְמִֽינְךָ֑ <WH3225> yə·mî·nə·ḵā Your right hand; מָחַ֖ץ <WH4272> mā·ḥaṣ He will crush בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> bə·yō·wm- in the day אַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> ’ap·pōw of His wrath. מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> mə·lā·ḵîm kings

יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> yā·ḏîn He will judge בַּ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> bag·gō·w·yim the nations, מָלֵ֣א <WH4390> mā·lê heaping up גְוִיּ֑וֹת <WH1472> ḡə·wî·yō·wṯ the dead; מָ֥חַץ <WH4272> mā·ḥaṣ He will crush רֹ֝֗אשׁ <WH7218> rōš the leaders עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- far אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ ... רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> rab·bāh and wide.

מִ֭נַּחַל <WH5158> min·na·ḥal from the brook בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> bad·de·reḵ by the road; יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> yiš·teh He will drink עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- therefore כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> kên ... יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> yā·rîm He will lift up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> rōš His head.
